header.description: Write your resume and receive AI proofreading at the same time.

banner.subTitle: Tips for Using the Service
banner.title: How can I best utilize this service?
banner.tip1: Writing about your experiences in as much detail as possible can improve the quality of the AI's proofreading
banner.tip2: Additionally, if you write about the tech stack used in your project, you can receive proofreading related to the content of your project
banner.tip3: Actively incorporate the AI's proofreading feedback and complete your own resume

section.title: Basic Information
section.guide: Please double-check to make sure the information you entered is correct

section.title: Work Experience
section.guide: Emphasize your expertise and collaboration skills by detailing specific achievements where you led the development of a particular feature

placeholder.content: Write about the roles you undertook and specific achievements you accomplished

section.title: Project
section.guide: Rather than simply stating what technology was used, try to emphasize the process of solving problems encountered in the project, what you learned, and the results

placeholder.title: Project Name
placeholder.content: Write about the content of the project, your role, and contribution

section.title: Awards and Activities
section.guide: Emphasize your continuous will to grow and expertise by detailing your motivation for participating in activities and what skills you were able to develop

placeholder.title: Name of Award or Activity
placeholder.content: Write about the lectures, presentations, studies, and external activities you participated in

aiSuggestion.title: The content corrected by AI is as follows
aiSuggestion.description: Try modifying the project content based on the correction
